# kraftcloud Provider

The KraftCloud provider allows Terraform to manage unikernel instances on KraftCloud.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "kraftcloud" {
  metro = "fra0"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `metro` (String) API metro
- `token` (String, Sensitive) API token
